definition: to develop/to evolve/to practice/to perform/to play/to act

sentences.english: Encourage South Korea ball exercises, collision Chinese fishing boats.
sentences.chinese: 鼓励南韩实弹演习，冲撞中国渔船。

sentences.english: All crew members assembled on boat deck and exercised abandon ship drill.
sentences.chinese: 全体船员在艇甲板上集合，进行弃船演习。

sentences.english: The American carrier George Washington was slated to participate in the drill.
sentences.chinese: 美国的华盛顿号航母被派遣参与这次演习。

sentences.english: I also use a resistive putty for tabletop exercises to do the same things with my patients.
sentences.chinese: 我也用电阻腻子桌面演习做同样的事，与我的病人。

sentences.english: There will be a fire drill at Rose Garden School.
sentences.chinese: 玫瑰学园将举办一场消防演习。

sentences.english: What we're not seeing now is a Strategic Defence Review.
sentences.chinese: 如今，我们不清楚的是战略防御演习。

sentences.english: An earthquake drill can teach your family what to do in an earthquake.
sentences.chinese: 防震演习可以让你们全家知道如何应对地震。

sentences.english: The admiral manoeuvred his ships in the battle plan.
sentences.chinese: 舰队司令按作战计划进行舰队演习。

sentences.english: This was the second day in a row that Iran tested missiles during military maneuvers.
sentences.chinese: 这是伊郎在演习中连续第二天试射导弹。

sentences.english: We usually hold our annual fire drill during the summer.
sentences.chinese: 我们通常在夏天举办年度消防演习。

sentences.english: But the current spat has become much more hostile, with both sides announcing live-fire naval drills were recently held.
sentences.chinese: 但目前争论日趋尖锐，双方近期都宣布进行实弹演习。

sentences.english: With the move from manoeuvre to trench warfare, both the infantry and the artillery had to learn how to work together.
sentences.chinese: 由演习过渡到阵地战，步兵和炮兵也需学会协同作战。

sentences.english: Younger people shouldn't be doing exercises breathing for 18-year-olds.
sentences.chinese: 年轻的人不应该做的演习，呼吸18岁。

sentences.english: A drill will be held to familiarize passengers with their assembly stations.
sentences.chinese: 搞演习的目的是让旅客熟悉集合地点。

sentences.english: We are planning on practicing fire drills next week.
sentences.chinese: 我们计划在下周在校内进行消防演习排练。

sentences.english: PLA Navy to conduct live-ammunition drill in Yellow Sea.
sentences.chinese: 中国人民解放军海军在黄海进行实弹演习。

definition: to form into columns/to organize into teams/formation (of ships or aircraft)
military aircraft/secret plan/Privy Council during the Qing dynasty
